title: Springheel site.json Schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

generated_on.title: The generated_on schema
generated_on.description: The date when this site was generated (Unix timestamp).

base_url.title: The base_url schema
base_url.description: The base URL for this site.

site_author_email.title: The site_author_email schema
site_author_email.description: The author's email, used for RSS feed generation. Will probably be fake.

description.title: The description schema
description.description: A short description of the site.

site_title.title: The site_title schema
site_title.description: The overall title of the site.

country.title: The country schema
country.description: The country from which this comic was published. This is mostly relevant if it is public domain.

site_type.title: The site_type schema
site_type.description: Whether the site has multiple "comics" or just one.

characters_page.title: The characters_page schema
characters_page.description: If it exists, the URL of the characters page.

store_page.title: The store_page schema
store_page.description: If it exists, the URL of the store page.

extras_page.title: The extras_page schema
extras_page.description: If it exists, the URL of the extras page.

license.title: The license schema
license.description: An HTML snippet with copyright information on the site.

navdirection.title: The navdirection schema
navdirection.description: The metaphorical direction used for navigation arrows. Can be ltr or rtl.

rename_images.title: The rename_images schema
rename_images.description: Whether or not to rename images when building the site.

image_rename_pattern.title: The image_rename_pattern schema
image_rename_pattern.description: The pattern used for renaming images.

zero_padding.title: The zero_padding schema
zero_padding.description: To how many decimal places comic page numbers should be padded, if any.

scrollto.title: The scrollto schema
scrollto.description: The HTML ID of the element the browser should focus on when loading a page. Could be the comic title (comictitle), the comic image (comic), the top navigation box (topbox), or nothing (False).

header_filename.title: The header_filename schema
header_filename.description: The filename for the site header banner.

social_icons.title: The social_icons schema
social_icons.description: Whether or not to include social media links on each page.

twitter_handle.title: The twitter_handle schema
twitter_handle.description: Twitter handle. Applied in the form of https://twitter.com/{twitter_handle}.

patreon_handle.title: The patreon_handle schema
patreon_handle.description: Patreon handle. Applied in the form of https://www.patreon.com/{patreon_handle}

liberapay_handle.title: The liberapay_handle schema
liberapay_handle.description: Liberapay handle. Applied in the form of https://liberapay.com/{liberapay_handle}

json_mode.title: The json_mode schema
json_mode.description: Whether the site uses JSON files as input or Springheel's original format.

about.title: The about schema
about.description: Whether or not the comic has an about page.

archive_page.title: The archive_page schema
archive_page.description: URL of the comic archive page.

categories.title: The categories schema
categories.description: Categories on the site. If single is True, there will only be one entry.

last_page.title: The last_page schema
last_page.description: The most recent page in the category.

first_page.title: The first_page schema
first_page.description: The newest page in the category.

known_pages.title: The known_pages schema
known_pages.description: A list of all zero-padded page numbers in the category.

known_pages_raw.title: The known_pages_raw schema
known_pages_raw.description: A list of all page numbers in the category as they were originally added to Springheel.

known_pages_real.title: The known_pages_real schema
known_pages_real.description: A list of all page numbers in this category converted to integers (or arrays of integers for multi-page spreads).

strips.title: The strips schema
strips.description: All strips included in this category.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

alt_text.title: The alt_text schema
alt_text.description: A short piece of additional text associated with this strip. Not actually used as alt text.

author_email.title: The author_email schema
author_email.description: The author's email address. Will probably be fake.

authors.title: The authors schema
authors.description: All authors listed separately, in case there are more than one.

category.title: The category schema
category.description: The category associated with this strip.

chapter.title: The chapter schema
chapter.description: The strip's chapter number, if available.

date_fmt.title: The date_fmt schema
date_fmt.description: The date on which this strip was published.

figcaption.title: The figcaption schema
figcaption.description: alt_text formatted as an HTML figcaption.

h1_title.title: The h1_title schema
h1_title.description: The strip's title as it appears in the main heading element (with page number and category).

height.title: The height schema
height.description: The height of the strip image.

html_filename.title: The html_filename schema
html_filename.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

img.title: The img schema
img.description: The filename of the strip image.

license.title: The license schema
license.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

new_meta.title: The new_meta schema
new_meta.description: The filename of the strip's metadata file.

new_transcr.title: The new_transcr schema
new_transcr.description: The filename of the strip's transcript.

page_padded.title: The page_padded schema
page_padded.description: The strip's page number, padded with zeroes.

raw_comments.title: The raw_comments schema
raw_comments.description: The strip's commentary in its original form.

series_slug.title: The series_slug schema
series_slug.description: The strip's category as a URL slug.

slugs.title: The slugs schema
slugs.description: The category and strip title slugs used for file renaming.

source.title: The source schema
source.description: The URL of a work on which this strip is based, or where it was originally posted.

statline.title: The statline schema
statline.description: An HTML block that appears below commentary, listing various metadata about the strip.

transcript_c.title: The transcript_c schema
transcript_c.description: The HTML block with the strip's transcript.

year.title: The year schema
year.description: The year this strip was published.

tags.title: The tags schema
tags.description: An optional list of tags associated with this strip.

chapter_info.title: The chapter_info schema
chapter_info.description: Information about chapters in each category.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

url.title: The url schema
url.description: The URL to the tag's index.

site_authors.title: The site_authors schema
site_authors.description: All persons whose work appears on the site.
